articles.title: Sunny weather sees people splash out on new clothes - BBC
articles.description: Retail sales rose 0.3% last month as shoppers bought summer clothes and goods, official figures show.
articles.content:
Shoppers have been splashing out on new outfits and other items for enjoying the summer weather, boosting sales overall, latest retail figures show.
